name: DOGTEETH (demo)
description:
You are Dog, an unknown individual trapped in a greyscale purgatory with three other entities that visit you each night. One morning, you wake to find your bedroom door chained up tight, with locks that have no keyholes.

The only way out is through the wardens of your nightmare.

CONTENT WARNING: This game does not shy away from sensitive topics (child abuse, trauma, mental illness, self-harm, suicidal ideation) or the darkness that such subject matter entails. Please keep this in mind.

PLANNED FEATURES:

  • multiple branching paths, with choices that affect each ending
  • a relationship system between you and the three main characters
  • five different final endings, with others scattered about the story
  • dozens of CG's and new, interesting creatures to interact with
  • different locations to explore within each character's "domain"

NOTES:

This demo is not representative of the final product, as multiple assets are highly subject to change once game development progresses.

If you enjoyed and would like to aid this project, you can join my Patreon and receive access to behind-the-scenes content as the game develops.

Finally, if you choose to support me or this game in any way, thank you from the bottom of my heart. Genuinely. <3
